alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 1:56AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Periods of snowfall impact portions of southwest Montana from this afternoon through Sunday afternoon... Snow will fall over portions of southwest Montana, where snow amounts will generally range from a trace to less than an inch at lower elevations, and two to four inches at pass level over a twenty four hour period. Localized areas may receive higher amounts. The greatest impacts are expected to occur at Monida Pass, Targhee Pass, Raynolds Pass and West Yellowstone. Those traveling should prepare for changing road conditions, including slippery roads and reduced visibility in snow and blowing snow.
